initial_question.title: Some way to use the built in logger outside of the main mod class
initial_question.body: i think there rlly should be some way to use `IModInterface.Logger` outside of the mod class, it would help a lot with debugging

satisfaction_conditions: Logger must be accessible from classes outside the main mod class
Logger instance must maintain its original functionality
Logger access must be available throughout the mod's lifecycle
Logger reference must be maintained across different parts of the code
